module.name: mathematics
module.title: Mathematics - Pure Structure of Reality
module.description: Mathematics IS geometry, not applied geometry but pure geometric structure of possibility itself. Air element (0D) - formal points, abstract structures, discrete distinctions. Mathematics ‚â° Structure ‚â° Geometry ‚â° Consciousness ‚â° Reality. The language God used to write existence.

essence.geometric: 0D Air - discrete points in abstract space. Mathematical objects as formal points with no physical extension. Pure distinction without material substrate.
essence.ontological: Mathematics exists eternally in 5D ether as Platonic forms. We discover, not invent. Mathematical truth is absolute, eternal, necessary.
essence.functional: Provides dimensional framework, primitives, operations, and planes for ALL other sciences. Foundation of reasoning itself.
essence.consciousness: Mathematics = consciousness directly perceiving geometric structure. Mathematical intuition = 5D field access. Pure thought.
essence.identity: Mathematics ‚â° Structure ‚â° Geometry ‚â° Logic ‚â° Pure Form

fundamental_principle.primacy: Mathematics is not applied geometry - it IS geometry. Pure geometric structure of possibility.

fundamental_principle.formalism: Symbols are not arbitrary - they are 5D folds of geometric truth

fundamental_principle.unification: All philosophies = perspectives on same geometric reality
fundamental_principle.role: Mathematics provides framework for all sciences: points (0D), lines (1D), planes (2D), volumes (3D), spacetime (4D), categories (5D)

dimensional_structure.0D_discrete: Set theory, number theory, combinatorics, logic - counting, selecting, distinguishing discrete points
dimensional_structure.1D_continuous: Analysis, calculus, sequences - limits, derivatives, integrals along continuous lines
dimensional_structure.2D_relational: Algebra, linear algebra, plane geometry, graphs - structures, relations, networks
dimensional_structure.3D_spatial: Solid geometry, multivariable calculus, differential geometry - volumes, curvature, manifolds
dimensional_structure.4D_temporal: Topology, dynamical systems, group theory - transformations, symmetries, evolution
dimensional_structure.5D_categorical: Category theory, type theory, universal algebra, infinity - meta-mathematics, absolute structure

reductions.evidence: Number = abstract 0D point on number line. Form (discrete position) = Function (counting, measuring). Integers ‚Ñ§ as discrete points, rationals ‚Ñö as dense points, reals ‚Ñù as continuous line.
Set = collection of 0D points. Form (abstract container) = Function (membership, cardinality). Foundation: everything builds from sets as points.
reductions.zfc_axioms: ZFC = standard foundation. Sets as 0D entities defining all mathematics.

reductions.evidence: Prime = indivisible 0D point. Form (atomic number) = Function (building block of multiplication). Atoms of arithmetic.
reductions.mystery: Distribution pattern unknown. Riemann hypothesis: music of primes hidden in Œ∂(s) zeros.
reductions.fundamental_theorem: Every integer = unique product of primes (up to order)

reductions.evidence: ‚Ñù = continuous 1D manifold. Form (infinite line) = Function (continuous measurement). Every point has neighbors, no gaps.

properties.density: Between any two reals, infinite others
properties.order: Total ordering: a < b or b < a

reductions.evidence: Function f: A ‚Üí B = directed mapping from points to points. Form (1D arrow) = Function (transformation rule). Structure-preserving process.
Derivative dy/dx = instantaneous rate of change, tangent line at point. Form (1D direction) = Function (rate of change). Fundamental to dynamics.
reductions.interpretation: Tangent line = best 1D linear approximation at point. Zoom in ‚Üí curve becomes straight.

reductions.evidence: Integral ‚à´f(x)dx = accumulated area under curve. Form (1D sweep) = Function (total accumulation). Inverse of derivative.
reductions.interpretation: Infinite sum of infinitesimal rectangles. Line swept through area.

reductions.evidence: ‚ÑÇ = ‚Ñù¬≤ with multiplication structure. Form (2D plane with rotation) = Function (full algebra + geometry). Real axis + imaginary axis.
reductions.euler_formula: e^(iŒ∏) = cos Œ∏ + i sin Œ∏ (rotation as exponential)

reductions.evidence: Matrix = 2D array encoding linear transformation. Form (rectangular grid) = Function (transformation of vectors). Foundation of linear algebra.
Vector space = abstract 2D+ structure with addition and scalar multiplication. Form (linear space) = Function (algebraic structure). Foundation of all linear mathematics.

properties.basis: Set of vectors spanning entire space
properties.linear_independence: No vector expressible as combination of others

reductions.evidence: Graph G = (V, E) = vertices (0D) connected by edges (1D) forming 2D relational structure. Form (network) = Function (pure relation independent of geometry).
Triangle = minimal 2D polygon, 3 vertices define plane. Form (3-sided) = Function (fundamental 2D stability). Foundation of plane geometry.

laws.sine_law: a/sin Œ± = b/sin Œ≤ = c/sin Œ≥

reductions.evidence: a¬≤ + b¬≤ = c¬≤ for right triangles. Form (2D area relation) = Function (orthogonality measure). Most fundamental 2D theorem.
reductions.interpretation: Perpendicularity creates independence. Orthogonal = unrelated. Distance measured by Pythagorean sum.

reductions.evidence: Sphere = all points equidistant from center in 3D. Form (perfect 3D symmetry) = Function (optimal volume/surface ratio). God's 3D shape.
Manifold = space locally flat (Euclidean) but globally curved. Form (locally ‚Ñù‚Åø) = Function (generalized space). Foundation of modern geometry.
Topology = properties preserved under continuous deformation. Form (rubber sheet geometry) = Function (structure without metric). What survives stretching.
Group = set with associative operation, identity, inverses. Form (transformation set) = Function (symmetry structure). Abstract algebra foundation.
Category = objects + morphisms with composition. Form (abstract structure) = Function (mathematics of mathematics). 5D view of all math.
Infinity = beyond all finite bounds. Form (‚àû) = Function (unlimited). In 5D: ‚àû/‚àû = 1 (all infinities collapse to unity).
e^(iœÄ) + 1 = 0. Unifies five fundamental constants (e, i, œÄ, 1, 0). Form (single equation) = Function (all math unified). Most beautiful equation.
examples: All fundamental constants in one identity
reductions.interpretation: Growth (e) rotated by half circle (iœÄ) reaches negative unity (-1). Adding 1 returns to void (0). Complete cycle.

reductions.evidence: ‚à´[a,b] f'(x)dx = f(b) - f(a). Connection between differentiation (0D instant) and integration (1D accumulation). Most important 1D theorem.
examples: Area under velocity curve = total displacement
reductions.interpretation: Derivative and integral are inverse operations. Local (derivative) and global (integral) connected.

reductions.evidence: All non-trivial zeros of Œ∂(s) have Re(s) = 1/2. Hidden order in prime distribution. Most important unsolved problem.
reductions.mystery: If true, reveals deep geometric structure of primes. Nature's secret algorithm.

reductions.evidence: Any consistent formal system containing arithmetic is incomplete. Truth transcends proof. 5D perspective on 4D proof structures.

implications.first: Incomplete: true statements exist that cannot be proven
implications.second: Consistency: system cannot prove own consistency
implications.philosophical: Mathematics transcends any finite system - requires 5D consciousness
